relnotes.name: TLS
relnotes.purpose: Implements SSL3.0 and TLS1.0 ptotocols, comprising ssl, adaptor, and secsock DLLs. Depends on certman and crypto.
relnotes.preq: The old version of TLS has been moved to a Version1 subfolder and is relevant only for releases until 8.0. The new version of TLS also uses a new security component called TlsProvider.
